Developer Terms of Use
des:
(1). Download our "Esi Centro" application in Google Play or iOS App Store;
(2). Start the application and register a new account (if you have already registered, please log in);
(3). Open the Esi device and connect with the "Esi Centro" application;
(4). Important information: You can use "ESi Centro App" to rename the device. Therefore, if the thermostat is named "Livingroom Light", then after discovering the device in step 9, Echo will get the same name.
(5). Download the Amazon "Alexa" application from the Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with the "Alexa" application;
(6). Search "Esi Centro" in the Alexa Skills directory;
(7). Click to enable the "Esi Centro" skill, then enter your account username, password and area on the link page;
(8). Talk to Echo " Alexa, discover the device .". Wait until Echo answers" Discovery completed ";
(9). Now complete all settings. Try talking to Echo to control your device
(10). Alexa, discover my smart home devices.
